general_advisory: Farmers are advised to maintain standing water in the fields, irrigate due to mild dry conditions, manage foot rot disease in paddy, apply Zinc sulfate in deficient soil, use appropriate insecticides, and herbicides. Specific crop advisories are provided for different stages.

advisory: To manage stem borer, use Trichogrammajaponicum card at weekly intervals and apply appropriate insecticides.
To manage stem rot, drench soil with Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole.
Select resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease.
Soak setts in a solution before planting.
To manage powdery mildew, spray appropriate fungicides.
To manage powdery mildew, spray appropriate fungicides.
To control cut worm, spray Chlorpyriphos + Cypermethrin.
To control mites, spray Ethion or Spiromesifen.
For controlling Aphid, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray Mancozeb or Difenoconazole.
To control black spot, spray Copper Oxy-chloride.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernating.
